mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.member_id AS memberId, r.store_id AS storeId, r.score, r.content, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.review_image AS reviewImage, m.nickname FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.id WHERE r.store_id = #{store_id} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (member_id, store_id, score, content, created_at, review_image) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{storeId}, #{score}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{reviewImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE id = #{id} AND member_id = #{member_id}
